title: COGNITIVE IMPAIRMENT AND DEMENTIA IN PARKINSON`S DISEASE
description: Author: Murat Emre Edition: 2 edition Publication Date: March 8, 2015 Publisher: Oxford University Press ISBN-10: 0199681643 ISBN-13: 978-0199681648 Pages: 320 pages Format: pdf Size: 6.1M --- In this edited volume, experts on the treatment of dementia associated with Parkinson`s Disease (PD) describes in detail the current status of knowledge in their respective area of expertise. The importance and clinical relevance of cognitive impairment and dementia in PD is emphasized, all relevant aspects including epidemiology, full and detailed spectrum of clinical features, current knowledge on pathology, neurochemistry and genetics, findings in auxillary investigations, relation to other neurodegenerative disorders, diagnostic process and management are described, rounded-up by discussion of future research directions and expectations. The text is complemented and enriched with tables, figures and is heavily referenced thereby capturing all relevant literature. --- http://dlfeb.com/book/cognitive-impairment-and-dementia-in-parkinsons-disease/

parsed.dn: COGNITIVE IMPAIRMENT AND DEMENTIA IN PARKINSON`S DISEASE
parsed.name: COGNITIVE IMPAIRMENT AND DEMENTIA IN PARKINSON`S DISEASE
